However , the duties and responsibilities of Secretarial Personnel are distinct from personnel of Secretarial and Technical Cadre, a separate transfer and rotation policy for Secretarial Personnel has been deemed necessary: Accordingly, in supersession to all earlier   instructions on the subject, the Competent Authority has approved the following policy regarding posting on rotation/transfer in respect of the Secretarial Personnel of NHAI: 2 Scope: This policy is applicable to all Personnel of Secretarial Cadre (all levels, including regular and deputationists): All postings on transfer/ rotation shall be dealt with in accordance with the principles enumerated in this policy and Delegation of Powers. 3 . Definitions: - Family: The term 'family' shall be as defined in the Central Services (Medical Attendance) Rules, 1944 (as amended from time to time): (B) Spouse: This means a Personnel, whose   spouse is an employee of any Central/State Government Organisation / PSU/ Autonomous Body, etc. (C) NHAI HQ: - National Highways Authority of India, 6-3, 5 & 6, Sector- 10, Dwarka, New Delhi 110075. D) Region:- Defined State(s) or part of State(s) under the respective Regional Office, which constitutes Regional   Office (RO)/ Project Implementation Unit (PIU)/ Corridor Management Unit (CMU) / Site Office (SO) or any other office under the jurisdiction of the concerned Regional Officer . (E) Location: Means Regional Office (RO)/Project Implementation Unit (PIU)/Site Office (SO)/Corridor Management Unit (CMU) or any other office under the jurisdiction of the Regional Officer.
